text: Arnaldo Pereira (born 11 January 1985 in Asunción, Paraguay) is a Paraguayan footballer currently playing for Alianza Petrolera of the Categoría Primera A. ==Teams== * 3 de Febrero 2008 * Sport Colombia 2009 * Sol de América 2010 * Lota Schwager 2011–present ==References== * Profile at BDFA * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Paraguayan footballers Category:Paraguayan expatriate footballers Category:Sport Colombia footballers Category:Sol de América footballers Category:Lota Schwager footballers Category:Alianza Petrolera players Category:Deportivo Capiatá players Category:Guabirá players Category:Sportivo Luqueño players Category:Paraguayan Primera División players Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:Expatriate footballers in Chile Category:Expatriate footballers in Colombia Category:Expatriate footballers in Bolivia Category:Association football defenders
title: Arnaldo Pereira
